title: Ticket #7082: User should be able to opt in to UTC, ISO_DATE, etc for userlog
description: There should be a submit keyword that allows the user to opt in to the various userlog formatting options such as UTC, ISO_DATE, SUB_SECOND and JSON, or to opt out of administrator defaults for these flags. This will require changes to submit_utils, and also to the Schedd/Shadow which looks at the UserLog and DAGManNodesLog attributes.
remarks:

Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.
